verses.verse: Paul,<WG3972> and Silvanus,<WG4610> and Timotheus,<WG5095> to the church<WG1577> of the Thessalonians<WG2331> which is in God<WG2316> the Father<WG3962> and in the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ:<WG5547> Grace<WG5485> be to you, and peace,<WG1515> from God<WG2316> our Father,<WG3962> and the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ.<WG5547>
We give thanks<WG2168> to God<WG2316> always<WG3842> for you all,<WG3956> making<WG4160> mention<WG3417> of you in our prayers;<WG4335>

Remembering<WG3421> without<WG89> ceasing<WG89> your<WG5209> work<WG2041> of faith,<WG4102> and labor<WG2873> of love,<WG25> and patience<WG5281> of hope<WG1680> in our Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> in the sight<WG1715> of God<WG2316> and our Father;<WG3962>
Knowing,<WG1492> brothers<WG80> beloved,<WG25> your<WG5216> election<WG1589> of God.<WG2316>

For our gospel<WG2098> came<WG1096> not to you in word<WG3056> only,<WG3440> but also<WG2532> in power,<WG1411> and in the Holy<WG40> Ghost,<WG4151> and in much<WG4183> assurance;<WG4136> as you know<WG1492> what<WG3634> manner<WG3634> of men we were among<WG1722> you for your<WG5209> sake.
And you became<WG1096> followers<WG3402> of us, and of the Lord,<WG2962> having received<WG1209> the word<WG3056> in much<WG4183> affliction,<WG2347> with joy<WG5479> of the Holy<WG40> Ghost.<WG4151>
So<WG5620> that you were ensamples<WG5179> to all<WG3956> that believe<WG4100> in Macedonia<WG3109> and Achaia.<WG882>

For from you sounded<WG1837> out the word<WG3056> of the Lord<WG2962> not only<WG3440> in Macedonia<WG3109> and Achaia,<WG882> but also<WG2532> in every<WG3956> place<WG5117> your<WG5216> faith<WG4102> to God-ward<WG4314> <WG2316> is spread<WG1831> abroad;<WG1831> so<WG5620> that we need<WG2192> <WG5532> not to speak<WG2980> any<WG5100> thing.

For they themselves<WG846> show<WG518> of us what<WG3697> manner<WG3697> of entering<WG1529> in we had<WG2192> to you, and how<WG4459> you turned<WG1994> to God<WG2316> from idols<WG1497> to serve<WG1398> the living<WG2198> and true<WG228> God;<WG2316>

And to wait<WG362> for his Son<WG5207> from heaven,<WG3772> whom<WG3739> he raised<WG1453> from the dead,<WG3498> even Jesus,<WG2424> which<WG3588> delivered<WG4506> us from the wrath<WG3709> to come.<WG2064>
